Certificate Authorities¶

Create top-level RootCA¶

  • Pki -> Certificate Authorities -> Add Certificate Authority
  1. Common name: CN in the certificate’s subject
  2. Name: Internal name. Automatically created
  3. Country: 2 letter country code
  4. State: The state
  5. Locality: The city
  6. Organization: The Organization
  7. OU: Organizational unit
  8. Email: The email address associalted with the certificate
  9. Key length: 1024, 2048 or 4096 bit
  10. Valid days: How many days is this certificate valid
  1. xxx
